question: ‘Rashtriya Kamdhenu Aayog’ has been constituted under which Union Ministry?
option2: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
option3: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry and Dairying
option4: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change
answer: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry and Dairying
explanation:
The Government of India has constituted the ‘Rashtriya Kamdhenu Aayog’, under the Department of Animal Husbandry and Dairying, Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry and Dairying
It aims to promote animal husbandry on modern and scientific means and to preserve and improve breeds of cattle. Recently, RKA started a nation-wide campaign to celebrate Kamdhenu Deepawali Abhiyan on the occasion of Diwali festival.
